home_subtitle: Exclusive stays on the island of Giannutri. Direct contact, no intermediaries.
welcome_subtitle: AquaView offers a carefully selected collection of holiday apartments on the island of Giannutri, ideal for those seeking crystal-clear sea, tranquility, and an authentic connection with nature.
welcome_subtitle2: We manage the properties directly, offering a simple, transparent experience with no intermediaries.
discovery_island_body1: Giannutri is a unique island in the Tuscan Archipelago, characterized by clear waters, protected nature, and an authentic, relaxing atmosphere.
discovery_island_body2: It is the ideal destination for those who want a holiday away from mass tourism.
why_aquaview_assistance: Assistance before and during your stay
name: First name
